          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_6ace274f5ef153e3e96ee35478e6bc176b780d86</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Discharging electricity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entladung von von Elektrizität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décharge de l'électricité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descarregando a eletricidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scaricare elettricità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απαλλαγή της ηλεκτρικής ενέργειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descargar electricidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure shows how the Earth, being neutral from positive and negative charges, and air can discharge an object of its negative charges or electrons.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">discharge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">static electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeigt, wie die Masse, seiend Null 
von den positiven und negativen Ladungen und von der Luft eine 
Nachricht seiner negativen Ladungen oder Elektronen entladen kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure montre comment la terre, étant neutre 
des charges positives et négatives, et de l'air peut décharger un 
objet de ses charges négatives ou électrons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura mostra como a terra, sendo neutra das 
cargas positivas e negativas, e do ar pode descarregar um objeto de 
seus cargas negativas ou elétrons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura mostra come la terra, essendo neutra 
dalle cariche positive e negative e dall'aria può scaricare un 
oggetto delle relativi cariche negative o elettroni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός επιδεικνύει πώς η γη, που είναι ουδέτερη 
από τις θετικές και αρνητικές δαπάνες, και τον αέρα μπορεί να 
απαλλάξει ένα αντικείμενο των αρνητικών δαπανών ή των 
ηλεκτρονίων της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura muestra cómo la tierra, siendo neutral 
de cargas positivas y negativas, y de aire puede descargar un objeto 
de sus cargas negativas o electrones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
